pageContent: Background: Radical cystoprostatectomy and radical prostatectomy are the two major operations where prostate is totally and radically removed. Radical cystoprostatectomy is usually performed in patients with invasive bladder cancer. The aim of the study was to examine Total PSA, Free PSA, and Free/Total Ratio elimination kinetics after radical cystoprostatectomy.

metaData.source:
MicroRNA-145 Modulates Tumor Sensitivity to Radiation in Prostate Cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26632856/
